name: A Lost Soul (Team Souls, SerbanHero, CodyWolf)
name_original: A Lost Soul (Team Souls, SerbanHero, CodyWolf)
description:
"A Lost Soul" is a game made in 7 days.

 Along your play through, you will have to discover a new planet and also fight with other souls and find new accessories that will give you the ability to double jump and double damage. 

Controls In space

W- Move forward

S- Move backward

A- Move left

D- Move right

E- Enter a planet

On planet

A- Move left

D- Move right 

Space bar- Jump

Left mouse button - Attack

E- Open/close chest

X- Show cursor (You can press on MiniMap)

+/- - Hotkeys for zooming in/out the MiniMap

Esc- Pause Menu

Links
